creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: one large, bold and brushy calligraphy character at R; smaller two line inscription at L with signature at far L
inscription:
Signature, Inscription, and Seals 

L: [Monk Zhaozhou\'s drawn sword / glistens like chilly frost blazing bright]
markings: Seal URC: (illegible); two seals LLC: [Zenkaku no in]; [Kaimon]
title: Calligraphy "Mu" (Nothingness)
